description.db:para: This table is used by the Call Center module to store ongoing calls for restart persitancy. It consists only of runtime data and should not be manually provisioned. More information can be found at: &OPENSIPS_MOD_DOC;call_center.html.

column.name: ig_cback
column.description: Indicates if the call should be ignored.

column.name: no_rej
column.description: Indicates whether the call can be rejected or not.

column.name: eta
column.description: The estimated wait time for a call until it is answered by an agent.

column.name: last_start
column.description: Stores the timestamp when the last call has started.

column.name: recv_time
column.description: Stores the timestamp when the call was received by the call center.

column.name: b2buaid
column.description: The B2B id internally used by the B2B module to identify the call.

column.name: flow
column.description: The flow/queue this call belongs to.

column.name: agent
column.description: The agent that handles the call.
